about_the_game:
Lofi Aquarium is a tool game designed to enhance work focus. Each time you complete a Pomodoro timer, you earn a bunch of tomato rewards. You can raise fish while you work, and the tomato rewards you earn will boost the growth rate of your fish. The harder you work, the faster your fish will grow. You can also earn more decorations or deep-sea plants. Use the money earned from your fish to create your own unique aquarium.

Purchase Fish Seed Packs to Unlock Rare Species!

While you work, your fish will gradually grow. Once they mature, you can sell them to earn coins, which can be used to draw more new fish (this process is random). You can also keep these fish to collect them, name them, pet them, and deepen your bond with them. You can even establish a single-species fish school.

Built-in Practical Productivity Tools:

Includes carefully curated lofi music, customizable white noise, Pomodoro seeds, and work lists. Each time you complete a Pomodoro session, you earn tomatoes, giving you positive reinforcement.
You can freely combine lofi music with calming white noise, such as meditation, focused rain sounds, or film reel sounds, to help you get into an efficient working state.

Feed your little fish during your work breaks. Hundreds of exquisite and rare fish species await your unlocking.

Rich Environments

Paired with lofi music, these environments provide a focused space tailored to you. For example, an astronaut arrives in a strange space where a helmeted child plays the piano with an umbrella mysteriously appearing behind him. This might be a planet that fulfills people's wishes.

Positive Feedback for Focused Work

Accumulating enough tomatoes can earn you decoration rewards, allowing you to create your unique aquarium.


And there's more to explore:

A wide variety of fish species await your unlocking.
Positive feedback from the Pomodoro timer: the harder you work, the more tomatoes you earn.
Continuously expand your aquarium space to raise more fish.
Increase the number of aquariums for more gaming experiences.
Scene spaces with hidden stories: a pianist in space, the secret of the hourglass, underwater, and more.
Dozens of customizable background white noise options to create your own immersive working state.
Dozens of lofi music tracks: lofi music, with its unique sense of loneliness and detachment, comforts the lonely urban crowd.
Idle growth gameplay, continuously accumulating achievements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5/i7/i9 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 700 series or newer, AMD Radeon R5/R7/R9 200 series or newer, Intel Iris / HD 5000 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Lofi Aquarium" is a gamified focus tool designed to enhance concentration and relieve stress. As you work, a group of adorable baby fish will keep you company, all set to soothing lofi music. Over time, the fish grow and can be sold for profit. ﻿
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal
